feed.title: Thoughts on Data Science, ML and Startups - About

entry.title: Vaidas
entry.content:
I am Vaidas Armonas - father, husband, data scientist/machine learning engineer (this part is in heavy development). I love solving business problems with data and (when necessary) ML models. Interested in extracting knowledge from data, software engineering, in particular how good practices contribute to productivity in data science, Data/MlOps, finding product (data products especially) market fit and few other things.

All opinions are my own.
